item.title: End US-84 at US-160
item.description: End US-84 at US-160 in Pagosa Springs. Turn right on US-160 east for Alamosa. Turn left on US-160 west for Pagosa Springs.

item.title: End US-84 West at US-160
item.description: End US-84 west at US-160 in Pagosa Springs. There is no END US-84 sign at this junction.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North at Split
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 north at split in Rio Arriba County. US-84 north continues straight; turn left for US-64 west.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North Approaching Split
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 north approaching US-64/US-84 split. Use US-84 north for Pagosa Springs (Colorado). Turn left for US-64 west to Dulce and Farmington.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North - Routes Divide
item.description: Approaching US-64 West/US-84 North route divide in Rio Arriba County.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North at NM-17
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 north at NM-17 in Chama. Turn left to continue west on US-64/US-84.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North Approaching NM-17
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 North approaching NM-17. Use NM-17 for the Village of Chama and Antonito (Colorado). Turn left to continue west on US-64/US-84 towards Dulce and Pagosa Springs (Colorado).

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North - NM-512 Jct.
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 North at NM-512 junction near Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-84/US-64 West - NM-112 Jct
item.description: US-84/US-64 West at NM-112 junction, near Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North Approaching NM-512
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 North approaching NM-512 near Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North at NM-531
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 north at NM-531 near Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-64 West/US-84 North Approaching NM-531
item.description: US-64 West/US-84 North approaching NM-531. Turn left for Escalante High School; turn right for Rio Arriba Court House (in Tierra Amarilla).

item.title: US-64 West at US-84
item.description: US-64 west at US-84. Turn right to continue west on US-84. US-64 joins US-84, through Chama, and over the Continental Divide. Turn left on US-64/US-84 for Chama and the Cumbres and Toltec Scenic Railroad; turn right on US-84 for Espanola.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching US-84
item.description: US-64 west approaching US-84 in Rio Arriba County.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching US-84
item.description: US-64 west approaching US-84 in Rio Arriba County.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 339
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 339 - US-85 South/Romeroville/Santa Rosa. US-84 leaves I-25 northbound here. Southbound, US-84 joins I-25 into Santa Fe.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 335
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 335 - Tecolote.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 330
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 330 - Bernal.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 330
item.description: I-25 North approaching Exit 330 - Bernal.

item.title: End NM-3 North at I-25
item.description: End NM-3 north at I-25. Use I-25 north for Las Vegas; I-25 south for Santa Fe.

item.title: NM-3 North Approaching I-25
item.description: NM-3 north approaching I-25 junction in San Miguel County.

item.title: US-84 West At NM-96
item.description: US-84 west at NM-96.

item.title: US-84 West Approaching NM-96
item.description: US-84 west approaching NM-96. Turn left for NM-96 west to Coyote and Gallina.

item.title: US-84 West - Entering Piedra Lumbre Land Grant
item.description: Entering Piedra Lumbre Land Grant on US-84 west.

item.title: End NM-74 West at US-84/US-285
item.description: End NM-74 west at US-84/US-285. Use US-84 West/US-285 North to Chama; use US-84 East/US-285 South to Espanola and Santa Fe.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North at US-84/US-285 Split
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North at US-84/US-285 split. Turn right for US-285 north; continue straight for US-84 west.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North Approaching US-84/US-285 Split
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North approaching US-84/US-285 split. Turn right for US-285 north to Ojo Caliente and Antonito, Colorado. Continue west on US-84 for Chama.

item.title: US-285 North/US-84 West at NM-74
item.description: US-285 North/US-84 west at NM-74.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North Approaching NM-74
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North approaching NM-74. Turn right on NM-74 for El Duende, Chamita and Ohkay Owingeh. Continue north on US-84 West/US-285 North for Chama.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-584
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-584 in Espanola.

item.title: US-285 North/US-84 West Approaching NM-584
item.description: US-285 North/US-84 West approaching NM-584 in Espanola.

item.title: US-285 North/US-84 West at NM-30
item.description: US-285 North/US-84 West at NM-30 south.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North Approaching NM-30
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North approaching NM-30. Use NM-30 south for Santa Clara Pueblo, and San Ildefonso Pueblo. Continue on US-84 West/US-285 North for Chama and Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North at US-84/US-285 Truck Route
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North at US-84/US-285 Truck Route (Santa Clara Bridge Road). Continue north on US-285/US-84 for general route through Espanola and NM-68. Truck traffic turn left for Chama and Los Alamos; continue straight towards Taos (via NM-68).

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North - NM-399/NM-106 Jct.
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-399/NM-106 Jct. Entering Espanola, Elevation 5590.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North Approaching NM-399/NM-106
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North approaching NM-399/NM-106.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North Approaching NM-106/NM-399
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North approaching NM-106/NM-399. Turn left on NM-399 for La Mesilla and Black Mesa Golf Club; right on NM-106 for Santa Cruz and Sombrillo.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-599 Interchange
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-599 interchange. Use NM-599 South for the Santa Fe Relief Route. The Sante Fe Relief Route connects the north side of Santa Fe to I-25 south without having to go through downtown Santa Fe.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-475
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-475 (Paseo de Peralta). Turn right on NM-475 for Santa Fe Ski Basin.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 282B-A and 284
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 282B-A - US-84/US-285 North/Santa Fe - Plaza/St. Francis Drive. Approaching Exit 284 - NM-466/Old Pecos Trail. Continue north on I-25 for Las Vegas. US-84 joins I-25 north towards Las Vegas; US-285 joins I-25 north for 8 miles.

item.title: I-25 North Approaching Exit 282
item.description: I-25 North approaching Exit 282 - US-84/US-285 North/Santa Fe Plaza/St. Francis Drive.

item.title: US-84/US-285 North - NM-502 Jct.
item.description: US-84/US-285 North - NM-502 West/Los Alamos exit. Continue north on US-84/US-285 North to Española.

item.title: US-84/US-285 North - Exit 171
item.description: US-84/US-285 North at Exit 171 - Flea Market Road.

item.title: End NM-599 East at US-84/US-285
item.description: End NM-599 (Santa Fe Relief Route) east at US-84/US-285. Use US-84/US-285 north for Española. Use US-84/US-285 south for Santa Fe.

item.title: End NM-599 East at US-84/US-285
item.description: End NM-599 (Santa Fe Relief Route) east at US-84/US-285. Use US-84/US-285 north for Española; use US-84/US-285 south for Santa Fe.

item.title: US-285 South at I-25 North
item.description: US-285 south at I-25 North (and US-84) onramp to Glorieta and Las Vegas.

item.title: US-285 South Approaching I-25 North
item.description: US-285 South Approaching I-25 (and US-84) north to Las Vegas.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 290
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 290 - US-285 South/Clines Corner. US-285 leaves I-25 south here.

item.title: I-25 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-25 north, leaving Santa Fe. Distance to US-285 Jct., Glorieta, and Las Vegas.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 284
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 284 - NM-466/Old Pecos Trail.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South at I-25 North
item.description: US-84/US-285 South (St. Francis Drive) at I-25 North to Las Vegas. US-285 South joins I-25 north for 8 miles. US-84 east joins I-25 north to just south of Las Vegas.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South at I-25
item.description: US-84/US-285 South (St. Francis Drive) at I-25. Use I-25 south for Albuquerque; use I-25 north for Las Vegas.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching I-25
item.description: US-84/US-285 South (St. Francis Drive) approaching I-25 in Santa Fe. Sign assembly uses a route diagram. Use I-25 north for Las Vegas; use I-25 south for Albuquerque.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South At NM-14
item.description: US-84/US-285 South (St. Francis Drive) At NM-14 (Cerrillos Road). Use St. Francis Drive south for I-25.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Exit 166
item.description: US-285 South/US-84 East at Exit 166 - NM-599 South/Santa Fe Relief Route. After this interchange, the US-84/US-285 South freeway ends and becomes St. Francis Drive, in Santa Fe.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching Exit 166
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching Exit 166 - NM-599/Santa Fe Relief Route.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching NM-599
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching NM-599 (Santa Fe Relief Route). All trucks bound for I-25 use NM-599.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Exit 168
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at Exit 168 - CH-73 North/Tesuque Village/Opera Drive/Av Monte Sereno.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Exit 172
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at Exit 172 - CH-73 South/Tesuque.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Exit 175
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at Exit 175 - Camel Rock Road.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Exit 176
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at Exit 176 - Cuyamungue.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Exit 177
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at Exit 177 - To CH-89B/CH-89D/Buffalo Thunder Road.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - NM-502
item.description: US-84/US-285 South on NM-502 offramp. Merge left for Cities of Gold Road. Merge right for NM-502 West for Los Alamos.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South at NM-503/CH-103
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at NM-503 and CH-103 in Pojoaque.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching NM-503 and NM-502
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching NM-503 and NM-502. The intersection with NM-503 is controlled by a stop light; the NM-502 intersection is a SPUI type interchange. Use NM-502 west for Los Alamos.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching NM-503
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching NM-503. Use NM-503 east for Nambé, Chimayo, Nambé Lake and Falls, and Sanitario de Chimayo.

item.title: Pojoaque Exits - US-84/US-285 South
item.description: Pojoaque Exits on US-84/US-285 South: NM-502, W. Gutierrez St., Viarrial St. The later two exits are actually intersections controlled by traffic signals.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - NM-106/NM-399 Jct.
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at NM-106/NM-399 Jct on the south side of Española. The New Mexico state highway shield is normally just a while circle minus the black border and Zia on a guide sign. In some cases the whole shield is added to the guide sign like in this case.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Santa Fe County Line
item.description: Santa Fe County Line on US-84/US-285 South. Taken on the south side of Española, which spans Rio Arriba and Santa Fe Counties.

item.title: End NM-68 South at US-285/US-84
item.description: End NM-68 South at US-84/US-285 South. Traffic for US-84/US-285 North turned right a block north of here. The traffic on the right side of the pictures is US-285/US-84 merging onto NM-68.

item.title: NM-68 South at US-84/US-285 North
item.description: NM-68 South (Riverside Drive) at US-84/US-285 North (Paseo de Onate) in Española. Continue south on NM-68 for US-84/US-285 South.

item.title: US-84/US-285 North Approaching NM-503
item.description: US-84/US-285 North approaching NM-503 in Pojoaque. This is the beginning of the High Road To Taos Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-84/US-285 North - Pojoaque
item.description: US-84/US-285 North in Pojoaque.

item.title: US-84/US-285 North Approaching NM-503
item.description: US-84/US-285 North approaching NM-503 East/Nambé.

item.title: End NM-502 East at US-285/US-84
item.description: End NM-502 East at US-285/US-84. UseUS-84/US-285 North for Española; use US-84/US-285 South for Santa Fe. This is the eastern end of the Los Alamos Highway.

item.title: NM-502 East - Pojoaque Frontage Road
item.description: Continue ahead on NM-502 East for the Pojoaque Frontage Road. Approaching US-84/US-285 junction in Pojoaque.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South at NM-68
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at NM-68. Turn right to continue on US-84/US-285 South. Turn left for NM-68.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Rio Grande
item.description: US-84/US-285 South - Rio Grande in Española. The bridge over the Rio Grande is called the Stanley A. Griego Bridge.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching NM-584
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching NM-584 (Fairview Drive) in Española.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Rio Arriba County
item.description: US-84/US-285 South in Rio Arriba County on the outskirts of Española. Taken just south of NM-74 junction.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South at NM-74 East
item.description: US-84/US-285 South at NM-74 East. Turn right on NM-74 for El Duende, Chamita, Ohkay Owingeh. Continue ahead on US-84/US-285 South for Española.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching NM-74
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching NM-74 near El Duende.

item.title: US-84 South at US-285
item.description: US-84 south at US-285. Turn left for US-285 north to Ojo Caliente and Antonio, Colorado. Continue south on US-84/US-285 South towards Española. US-285 joins US-84 south through Santa Fe.

item.title: US-84 South - Abiquiu Jct.
item.description: US-84 South at Abiquiu access.

item.title: US-84 South - Rio Arriba County
item.description: US-84 South in Rio Arriba County, just south of NM-96 jct.

item.title: US-84 South at NM-96
item.description: US-84 south at NM-96 west to Coyote and Gallina

item.title: US-84 South Approaching NM-96
item.description: US-84 South approaching NM-96 west in Rio Arriba County.

item.title: US-84 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-84 south to Española and Santa Fe.

item.title: US-84 South at NM-115 East
item.description: US-84 south at NM-115 East. Use NM-115 east for Canjilon and Canjilon Lakes.

item.title: US-84 South Approaching NM-115
item.description: US-84 South approaching NM-115 in Rio Arriba County.

item.title: US-84 South at NM-221
item.description: US-84 South at NM-221 in Cebolla.

item.title: US-84 South at Cebolla Post Office Jct.
item.description: US-84 South at junction to Cebolla Post Office.

item.title: US-84 South at NM-162
item.description: US-84 South at NM-162 in Rio Arriba County.

item.title: US-84 South/US-64 East At Split
item.description: US-84 South/US-64 East at Split. US-64 turns east here towards Taos. Northbound US-64 joins US-84 to west of Chama.

item.title: US-84 South/US-64 East at NM-531
item.description: US-84 South/US-64 East at NM-531 in Tierra Amarilla. Turn right on NM-531 for Escalante High School; left for Rio Arriba (County) Court House.

item.title: US-84 South/US-64 East Approaching NM-531
item.description: US-84 South/US-64 East approaching NM-531 in Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-84 South/US-64 East Approaching NM-95
item.description: US-84 South/US-64 East approaching NM-95. Use NM-95 for Heron Lake State Park.

item.title: End NM-17 South at US-64/US-84
item.description: End NM-17 South at US-64/US-84 in Chama. Turn right for US-64 West/US-84 North to Dulce and Pagosa Springs (Colorado); continue ahead for US-64 East/US-84 South to Tierra Amarilla and Española.

item.title: End NM-17 South at US-64/US-84
item.description: NM-17 South approaching US-64/US-84 in Chama.

item.title: US-84 South/US-64 East at NM-17
item.description: US-84 South/US-64 East at NM-17 in Chama. Turn right to continue on US-84 South/US-64 East; turn left for NM-17.

item.title: US-84 South/US-64 East at NM-17
item.description: US-84 South/US-64 East at NM-17. Use NM-17 north for Village of Chama Main St. and Cumbres and Toltec Train Station

item.title: US-64/US-84 in Chama
item.description: US-64/US-84 in Chama. There were two sets of every sign when this picture was taken between US-64/US-84 junction west of here into Chama. There was road construction and it appears new signs were part of the project.

item.title: US-64 East/US-84 South - Village of Chama
item.description: US-64 East/US-84 South - Village of Chama (Elevation 7800 Feet).

item.title: US-64 East/US-84 South
item.description: US-64 East/US-84 South in Rio Arriba County.

item.title: US-84 South at US-64
item.description: US-84 south at US-64 junction in Rio Arriba County. Turn left for US-64 west; continue ahead for US-84 South/US-64 east. US-64 joins US-84 through Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-84 South at US-64
item.description: US-84 south at US-64 west to Jicarilla Apache Reservation. US-64 joins US-84 through Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: US-160 East at US-84
item.description: US-160 east at US-84 in Pagosa Springs. Merge right for US-84. This is the western terminus of US-84. The eastern end of US-84 is in Midway, Georgia.

item.title: US-160 East at Begin US-84 East
item.description: US-160 East at Begin US-84 East in Pagosa Springs. Use US-84 east for Chama (New Mexico); continue east on US-160 for Alamosa.
